means: （对某人容貌、性格等所进行的）人身攻击
人身攻击( personality的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: The contest was as much about personalities as it was about politics.
sentence.Network_cn: 竞赛比手段策略，也比个性。

sentence.Network_en: She is one of the wealthiest, most ubiquitous media personalities around.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是目前最富有、最受媒体追捧的人物之一。

sentence.Network_en: There seemed to be a degree of personalities in her remarks.
sentence.Network_cn: 她话里有些人身攻击的成分.

1、个性（personality）（Personality）：车手的驾驶风格决定了他是攻击侵略型的还是温顺缜密型的。2、成功（Success）：在每一项赛事中，终极 …

entry.def: Your personality is your whole character and nature.

example.ex: She has such a kind, friendly personality...
Through sheer force of personality Hugh Trenchard had got his way...
example.tran: 休·特伦查德完全凭着个人魅力就能随心所欲。

entry.tran: 强烈的（或鲜明的)个性;个性鲜明的人
entry.def: If someone has personality or is a personality, they have a strong and lively character.

example.ex: He is such a personality — he is so funny.
example.tran: 他很有个性魅力——非常风趣。

entry.tran: （娱乐界或体育界的）名流，名人，风云人物
entry.def: You can refer to a famous person, especially in entertainment, broadcasting, or sport, as a personality.

example.ex: ...the radio and television personality, Jimmy Saville.
example.tran: 广播电视界风云人物，吉米·萨维尔

auth_sentence.content: This is a family of strong, passionate personalities.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a family of strong, passionate personalities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a family of strong, passionate personalities.

auth_sentence.content: It is good to have both personalities in charge.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is good to have both personalities in charge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is good to have both personalities in charge.

auth_sentence.content: But, many other important personalities will be there.
auth_sentence.res_content: But, many other important personalities will be there.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But, many other important personalities will be there.
